title: Zenodo Datasets Schema for CZ Net v1.0.0

access_conditions.title: Access conditions
access_conditions.description: Conditions under which access is given if record is restricted.

affiliation.title: Affiliation
affiliation.description: Affiliation for the purpose of this specific record.

name.title: Full name
name.description: Full name of person or organisation. Personal name format: family, given.

errorMessage.pattern: must match the ORCID pattern. e.g. '0000-0001-2345-6789'

creators.title: Creators
creators.description: Creators of record in order of importance.

embargo_date.title: Embargo date
embargo_date.description: Embargo date of record (ISO8601 formatted date)

notes.title: Funding Agency Metadata
notes.description: Add metadata associated with funding agency credits for a resource in the format provided. Please separate multiple entries with an empty line.

Funding Agency Name: 
Award Title: 
Award Number: 
Funding Agency URL:

references.title: References

options.placeholder: e.g. 'Cranmer, Kyle et al. (2014). Decouple software associated to arXiv:1401.0080.'

references.description: Raw textual references for related publications and datasets when identifier is not known.

items.title: Reference string
items.description: A string providing the full reference for the related item.

related_identifiers.title: Related identifiers
related_identifiers.description: Identifiers of related publications and datasets.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Identifier of the related publication or dataset.

relation.title: Relationship type
relation.description: The type of relationship between this item and the related item.

oneOf.title: is a supplement to this upload
has additional metadata from this upload
is additional metadata for this upload
is previous version of this upload
is new version of this upload
is a variant or different form of this upload
is an original form of this upload
is the source this upload is derived from
has this upload as its source

resource_type.title: Resource type
resource_type.description: Resource type of the related identifier.

subjects.title: Subjects from specific vocabularies
subjects.description: Subjects from a taxonomy or controlled vocabulary.

version.title: Version
version.description: Record version tag. Mostly relevant for software and dataset uploads. Any string will be accepted, but semantically-versioned tag is recommended.

UrlPattern.title: Link
UrlPattern.description: URL pointing to a description of the license or rights statement
